featured.text: The newcomer speaks with a strong Irish _____; he must be from Ireland.

definition.zh_def: 愛爾蘭是一個位於西歐的島嶼國家，分為愛爾蘭共和國和北愛爾蘭。
definition.en_def: Ireland is an island country in Western Europe, divided into the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland.
definition.example: I plan to visit Ireland next summer to explore its beautiful landscapes.
